name: Shadow Assassin Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Ambrite Fossilized Beetle
description: Used to craft the shield Coleoptera.

name: Ambrite Fossilized Grub
description: Used to craft the hammer Diptera.

name: PvP Qualifier Prizes: Third and Fourth Place
description: Congratulations on your placement in the qualifying tournament. Double-click to receive your rewards.

name: Ambrite Fossilized Devourer
description: Used to craft the greatsword Scorpiones.

name: Ambrite Cache
description: Contains Lumps of Raw Ambrite, a Zephyrite Lockpick, and other loot.

name: Nomad's Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Healing, and +Vitality. Nomad's weapon recipes are found in buried chests in the Maguuma Wastes.

name: Ambrite Fossilized Cricket
description: Used to craft the warhorn Orthoptera.

name: Nomad's Intricate Gossamer Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Toughness, +Healing, and +Vitality. Nomad's armor recipes are found in buried chests in the Maguuma Wastes.

name: Ambrite Fossilized Termite
description: Used to craft the dagger Blattodea.

name: Zephyrite Lockpick
description:
This key opens a buried locked chest in Dry Top. These chests are only visible during sandstorms.

<c=@flavor>Buried locked chests can contain armor, weapons, rare skins, recipes, ambrite, and more.</c>

name: Recipe: Lampyridae
description: Double-click to learn this torch recipe.

description: <c=@flavor>Some things from Dry Top that Taimi would like you to have as a thank-you.</c>

name: Basic Lumber Node Pack
description: This activates 3 lumber nodes within your home instance for daily logging. The trees created provide green, soft, and seasoned logs.

name: Mini Mordrem Thrasher
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.
